name: HIV Services
description: As part of their commitment to provide community mental health to our community, through funding made possible from the Alameda County Office of HIV Care, the Pacific Center provides free mental health services to folks living with HIV in the county who are eligible for Ryan White Services. Qualified clients can access individual and/or group counseling at no cost. The mental health services are provided by pre-licensed and post licensed clinicians who are trained in dealing with specific needs

howToGetIt: Contact DeAngela, Sr. HIV Program Manager: Email: deangela@pacificcenter.org Phone: (510) 766-2967 or got to: https://scheduler.zoom.us/referrals-pacific-center/referrals-registration-appts
keywords: i am part of a family with children under 18 years old.
